title: First
description: Levi POV NovellaLevi's got it all. He's a paranormal prince with more money and power than he knows what to do with, but something is missingâ€”a mate. He only has until college graduation to find her.Allie's perfect but she wants nothing to do with him. When attraction becomes something more, will he take a chance and show her who he really is or will he lose everything?
author: Alyssa Rose Ivy
